channel.title: AI on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: The rise of AI applications with LLM
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In the course of technological history, few developments have captured the imagination and transformed industries as swiftly and profoundly as the recent surge in artificial intelligence.

item.title: Prevent Prompt Injection
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Nowadays, Large Language Models (LLMs) have become integral to various applications. However, with great power comes great responsibility, and the rise of LLMs has introduced new security challenges.

item.title: Journey of Thought Prompting: Harnessing AI to Craft Better Prompts
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The Problem with Prompt Engineering Let’s face it: prompt engineering is hard. We’re all fumbling in the dark, trying to coax these large language models into doing what we want.

item.title: LLM tracing in AI system
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: When Building software with Large Language Models (LLMs) involves several steps, from planning to deployment. LLM tracing emerges as a final step in this process, providing ongoing insights and enabling continuous improvement of LLM-powered applications.

item.title: Market Report August 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Key Takeaways Tools like Cursor and Claude 3.5 Sonnet are redefining programming by shifting focus from manual coding to guiding AI-generated code, signaling a move toward AI-driven development.

item.title: Generative UI
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is Generative UI? A generative UI (genUI) is a user interface that responds to the user with AI-generated elements instead of just text messages.

item.title: Market Report July 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Key Takeaways Meta’s Llama 3.1, particularly the 405B parameter model, marks a significant advancement in open-source AI, competing with leading closed-source alternatives.

item.title: Function calling in AI agents
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Function calling is a critical component in the architecture of AI agents, facilitating the integration of external functionalities and resources.

item.title: Building Agent Supervisors to Generate Insights
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction In the rapidly evolving field of artificial intelligence, the concept of agent supervisors has emerged as a powerful approach to orchestrating multiple AI agents for complex tasks.

item.title: How we crafted the OGIF summarizer bot to streamline weekly knowledge-sharing
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What’s OGIF? OGIF stands for “Oh God It’s Friday.” It’s our weekly Friday tradition where members share 10-minute talks. The team hops on Discord to share and discuss diverse topics like software development, engineering patterns, industry trends, finance, entrepreneurship, blockchain, AI, and a mix of other cool stuff.

item.title: Proximal Policy Optimization
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) is an algorithm that aims to improve the stability of training by avoiding overly large policy updates.

item.title: Explaining Gradient Descent in Machine Learning with a simple analogy
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Gradient descent is a fundamental optimization algorithm in machine learning. It’s a bit like finding your way down a mountain in the fog: you take small steps in the direction that seems to be going downhill the fastest.

item.title: How to talk to ChatGPT effectively
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: ChatGPT, an advanced language model by OpenAI, offers a unique way to interact with AI. The quality of results depends on the information and how well you craft your input.

item.title: Market Report May 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Key Takeaways GPT-4o’s new advancements can challenge many current businesses while making LLMs foundational for a new wave of software applications.

item.title: Market Report April 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Key Takeaways Meta’s Llama 3, Databricks’ DBRX, and Mixtral 8x22B are setting new standards in AI capabilities, offering high-quality options for self-hosted LLM applications.

item.title: Market Report Mar 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In this month’s market report, we explore the evolving landscape of artificial intelligence, API techniques, toolings, programming languages, and the intersection of design and engineering.

item.title: Market Report Feb 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Trends on our Radar This month has been a continuation of AI and an upwards trend on FinOps and CyberSecurity.

item.title: Market Report Jan 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Trends on our Radar Here are some of the few trends we are seeing across the industry, in our projects, as well as our community.

item.title: Forward Engineering November 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This month, we have focused on revamping how we learn, familiarize, and work with tech. We are excited to announce that we have updated our Forward Engineering to better reflect the feedback and insights from our Labs team, Operations Team, and Consulting Team.

item.title: Forward Engineering October 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As we step into the exciting opportunities of October, we are at a crucial point in the ever-changing world of technology.

item.title: How We Created An Ai Powered Interview System Using Openais Chatgpt
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The Idea While ChatGPT has garnered a lot of attention over the last few months, Ngoc Thanh, our senior software engineer, has been exploring how OpenAI’s API can expedite and elevate job interviews by distilling key candidate insights through an interactive chat interview.

item.title: Forward Engineering December 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This month, we have focused on revamping how we learn, familiarize, and work with tech. We are excited to announce that we have updated our Forward Engineering to better reflect the feedback and insights from our Labs team, Operations Team, and Consulting Team.

item.title: Development Journey with Search.io Australia AI Power Search Solutions
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Founded in 2017 and reached a total seed funding of $4M by 2020, Search.io, formerly Sajari, is an AI-powered search and product discovery platform that helps eCommerce brands and retailers maximize their revenue and conversion rates through outcome-focused, real-time search result optimization.
